rules.name: Yes_ready_to_go
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 3 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7) OR (2 AND 4) OR (8 OR 9)
rules.label: Yes, ready to go

fields.fieldText: Invoice Delivery Method

fields.fieldText: Please add next steps that should be taken on this opportunity.

fields.fieldText: Next Steps

fields.name: AddProducts
fields.fieldText: Please go back to the opportunity and add products.

fields.name: introVATNumber
fields.fieldText: Please add VAT number below.

fields.name: IntroFinish2
fields.fieldText:
The opportunity is almost ready to submitted for approval. Once Solution Owner indicates the details, the opportunity can be submitted for approval.

If you click "Finish", you will be redirected to the opportunity page.

screens.description: Check whether the opportunity is ready to be submitted for approval or not.
screens.name: Check_Opportunity_readiness
screens.label: Check Opportunity readiness

fields.name: IntroText
fields.fieldText: Click "Next" to check what information is missing to submit this opportunity for approval.

fields.name: introSelectSolutionOwner
fields.fieldText: Solution Owner is missing on this opportunity though Solutions are required. Please select the solution owner.

fields.name: introCloseDate
fields.fieldText: Close Date of this opportunity is in the past. Please update it below.

fields.name: Close_Date_Entered
fields.fieldText: Close Date

fields.name: deploymenttext
fields.fieldText:
At the moment we have the follow information on Customer Deployment.  


Deployment departments: {!CurrentOpportunity.Account.Deployment_Department__c}

Deployment regions: {!CurrentOpportunity.Account.Deployment_Region__c} 


Is this still the case? If not please select all of the departments and regions currently using Bynder below.

fields.name: FieldsMissingText
fields.fieldText: Please fill the information on Customer Deployment.

fields.name: Deployment_Department
fields.fieldText: Deployment Department

fields.name: Deployment_Region
fields.fieldText: Deployment Region

fields.name: IntroBillingDetails
fields.fieldText: Please enter Billing Details below or confirm that they are correct.

fields.name: Billing_Account_Name
fields.fieldText: Billing Account Name

fields.name: Bill_to_First_Name
fields.fieldText: Bill to First Name

fields.name: Bill_to_Last_Name
fields.fieldText: Bill to Last Name

fields.name: ContractDatesRequired
fields.fieldText: Your opportunity is missing contract dates. Please enter them below.

fields.name: Contract_Start_Date
fields.fieldText: Contract Start Date

validationRule.errorMessage: Contract start date must come before the contract end date.

fields.name: Contract_End_Date
fields.fieldText: Contract End Date

validationRule.errorMessage: Please correct the contract end date. It is one day too long.

fields.name: IntroStartDateOtherOpps
fields.fieldText: Your opportunity is missing contract start date. Please enter it below.

fields.name: Contract_Start_Date_Other_Type_Opp
fields.fieldText: Contract Start Date

validationRule.errorMessage: Contract start date must come before the contract end date.

fields.name: EndDateReminder
fields.fieldText: Please keep in mind that the contract end date is {!CurrentOpportunity.End_date_contract__c}. The start date cannot be after the end date.

fields.name: introDatabaseLocation
fields.fieldText: Please add Database location below.

fields.name: IntroInvoicePeriod
fields.fieldText: Opportunity is missing Invoice period. Please enter it below.

fields.name: Invoice_Period
fields.fieldText: Invoice Period (in months)
fields.helpText: Invoice Period is the number of months for which a customer pays per invoice (e.g., fees for 6 or 12 months per invoice).

fields.name: InvoicePeriodExplained
fields.fieldText: Invoice Period is the number of months for which a customer pays per invoice (e.g., fees for 6 or 12 months per invoice).

fields.name: IntroMainObjective
fields.fieldText: Please enter at least one prospect's main objective for implementing Bynder.

fields.name: Main_Objective_1
fields.fieldText: Main Objective 1

fields.name: Main_Objective_2
fields.fieldText: Main Objective 2

fields.name: Main_Objective_3
fields.fieldText: Main Objective 3

screens.description: BODEV-166: Let user to specify Marketing Cloud Org ID
screens.name: Enter_Marketing_Cloud_Org_ID
screens.label: Enter Marketing Cloud Org ID

fields.name: Require_Marketing_Cloud_Org_ID
fields.fieldText:
As this Opportunity includes Salesforce Marketing Cloud Connector/Commerce Cloud Connector/Salesforce Lightning Web Component, the customer's Salesforce Org ID is required in order for Bynder to submit an order to Salesforce.


For Instance, if the opportunity has combination of products included(Salesforce Marketing Cloud Connector & Salesforce Lightning Web Component) then multiple Salesforce Org IDs can be specified separated by a comma in-between.

fields.name: Marketing_Cloud_Org_ID
fields.fieldText: Salesforce Org ID

fields.name: IntroNoticePeriod
fields.fieldText: Notice period is not filled. Please enter notice period (in months) below.

fields.name: Notice_Period
fields.fieldText: Notice Period (in months)
fields.helpText: Notice Period is a number of months notice require to cancel the contract.

fields.name: NoticePeriodExplained
fields.fieldText: Notice Period is a number of months notice require to cancel the contract.

fields.name: Intro_OEMPartner
fields.fieldText: Is a partner involved? If so, please select OEM/Partner. (Otherwise, leave it blank)

fields.name: Intro_OEMPartner_0
fields.fieldText: Please select the current vendor (Current tool that the prospect is using)

fields.name: IntroPaymentPeriod
fields.fieldText: Opportunity is missing Payment period. Please enter it below.

fields.name: Payment_Period
fields.fieldText: Payment Period
fields.helpText: Payment Period is the time period within which a customer must pay fees and charges.

fields.name: PaymentPeriodExplained
fields.fieldText: Payment Period is the time period within which a customer must pay fees and charges.

fields.name: IntroPONeeded
fields.fieldText: Please indicate whether the PO is needed for this company or not.

fields.name: PO_Needed
fields.fieldText: PO Needed?

fields.name: introPONumberEnter
fields.fieldText:
(OPTIONAL)

You can enter PO number below. If you don't want to do it, leave the field blank and click "Next".

fields.name: OPTIONAL_PO_Number
fields.fieldText: (OPTIONAL) PO Number

validationRule.errorMessage: PO should be 45 characters or fewer.

fields.name: IntroRenewalTerm
fields.fieldText: Contract Renewal term is missing. Please enter renewal term below (in months).

fields.name: Contract_Renewal_Term
fields.fieldText: Contract Renewal Term (in months)
fields.helpText: Renewal Term is the duration of the renewal opportunity as stated in the contract.

fields.name: RenewalTermExplained
fields.fieldText: Renewal Term is the duration of the renewal opportunity as stated in the contract.

fields.name: IntroSolutionDetails
fields.fieldText: Solution details are missing or incorrect. The Solution Owner has been notified and requested to fill in the details.

fields.name: IntroUseCase
fields.fieldText: Please select the use case for this opportunity - what for prospect is going to use Bynder?

fields.name: Use_Case
fields.fieldText: Use Case

fields.name: IntroWinReason
fields.fieldText: Please enter Primary Win Reason and/or Win Reason Detail below. Why this deal is a win?

fields.name: Win_Reason_Detail
fields.fieldText: Win Reason Detail

fields.name: IntroWinReason_0
fields.fieldText: Please expand on the Primary Win Reason. Were there other factors that influenced the deal?

fields.name: Win_Reason_Detail_0
fields.fieldText: Win Reason Detail

fields.name: LossReasonRequired
fields.fieldText: This is a downsell. Please enter Primary Loss Reason and/or Loss Reason Detail.

fields.name: Loss_Reason_Detail
fields.fieldText: Loss Reason Detail

fields.name: Did_Current_conditions_impact_decision
fields.fieldText: Did Current conditions impact decision?
fields.helpText: Specify 'Yes' if current economic conditions impact the decision. Also, If the loss category is 'Organisational change' this field should be filled.

fields.name: LossReasonRequired_0
fields.fieldText: This is a downsell. Please expand on the Loss Reason for this opportunity.

fields.name: Loss_Reason_Detail_0
fields.fieldText: Loss Reason Detail

fields.name: ErrorMessage
fields.fieldText:
An error occurred while updating the opportunity. Please correct the issues and try again.


Error Message:

{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: ErrorMessage_0
fields.fieldText:
An error occurred while updating the opportunity. Please correct the issues and try again.


Error Message:

{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: ErrorMessage_0_0
fields.fieldText:
An error occurred while updating the account. Please correct the issues and try again.


Error Message:

{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: introInvoicingStructure
fields.fieldText: Invoicing Structure is not standard on this account. Please specify below why.

fields.name: Comments
fields.fieldText: Comments

fields.name: DoA_warning
fields.fieldText:
Prices and terms have not been finalized for this Opportunity.

Please use Finalize Prices & Terms button, and get approval if required.

fields.name: OpportunityReadyForApproval
fields.fieldText: Your opportunity is ready to be submitted for approval.

fields.name: Submit_opportunity_for_approval_now
fields.fieldText: Submit opportunity for approval now

fields.name: Waived_text
fields.fieldText:
Indexation is currently in place on this opportunity. If you have agreed otherwise in the contract, please change the "Waive Indexation?" field before submitting to QA Approval.

You can see how to do this here: https://bynder.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/SD/pages/3705667946/Change+indexation+decision+on+opportunity

fields.name: introNotSubmitted
fields.fieldText: Oops! Something went wrong and your opportunity has not been submitted for approval. Try checking "Ready for "Closed Won"?" section again.

fields.name: AddContactroles
fields.fieldText: Please add contacts with roles 'Decision Maker' and 'Champion' to the account before submitting the opportunity for QA approval.

fields.name: introSolutionsRequired
fields.fieldText: Please select whether Solutions Required or not.

fields.name: Solutions_Required_Select
fields.fieldText: Solutions Required

fields.name: introSubmitted
fields.fieldText: Your opportunity has been successfully submitted for approval. If you click "Finish", you will be redirected to the opportunity page.

fields.name: BynderSub
fields.fieldText: Please confirm Bynder Subsidiary

screens.name: The_opportunity_is_ready_to_be_submitted
screens.label: The opportunity is ready to be submitted

fields.name: introNotSubmittedUsersChoice
fields.fieldText:
Your opportunity has not been submitted for approval.

Once you click "Finish", you will be automatically redirected to the opportunity's page.

fields.name: introUploadContract
fields.fieldText:
(OPTIONAL)

You can upload a signed contract using the form below.

fields.name: waitMessage
fields.fieldText: Supplier form had been sent to the customer asking for their billing details, please submit for QA approval after the details are filled from the form.

textTemplates.name: VarT_MessageToSolOwner
textTemplates.text: Hi @[{!CurrentOpportunity.Solution_Owner__c}], please update the customisation fields.

variables.description: Indicates current opportunity that the flow is working with.
